text: The Tamil Nadu Anganwadi Employees and Assistants’ Association has urged the State Government to fix the minimum wages of anganwadi workers at Rs. 15,000 per month, said S. Angammal, its state president. Speaking at the all India foundation day of the association here on Friday, she pleaded for provision of pension. She urged the government to fill up all the vacancies in the anganwadis. Shanmugasanthi, Dharmapuri district president of the association, and others spoke highlighting the demands.
title: Call to fix minimum wages
